long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Save All WhatsApp Statuses with WSTOOL - WhatsApp Status Downloader

The WSTOOL - WhatsApp Status Downloader is a user-friendly browser extension designed to streamline the process of saving WhatsApp statuses directly from the web version. With this tool, users can quickly and efficiently download images and videos from their WhatsApp Web session without relying on additional apps or complicated steps.

Once installed, the extension offers a seamless interface where users can scan and preview all available WhatsApp statuses in their session. By clicking the “Scan Status” button, users can instantly view all statuses and select one or multiple files to download. Whether it’s an image or a video, the downloader ensures a hassle-free experience with just a few clicks.

This extension is equipped with advanced features like automatic media handling, which ensures files are saved in the correct format, and sequential downloading for statuses containing multiple items. Users can skip manual navigation as the extension cycles through media in a status and downloads everything effortlessly.

Additionally, it prevents duplicates by tracking previously downloaded files and offers an optional in-app purchase to remove download limits. With the WSTOOL - WhatsApp Status Downloader, saving your favorite statuses has never been more convenient, making it an essential companion for WhatsApp Web users.

Powered by WSTOOL PRO
